title: My Pixel 3 XL get bricked completely
content:
Sorry,my English is poor so some syntax I may get wrong. 

My device is Pixel 3 XL, G013C Unlocked.Android 10 July
I have unlocked Bootloader half year ago.Then I used Magisk make my device get root.I have not installed any xposed framework like TaiChi or Edxposed.

My Pixel suddenly get strucked few days ago,then it became black screen completely. Black screen continues till now.
Now I can't enter the FastBoot mode.It doesn't display anything and react any response when I connect it to the charger or the computer.
"Press and hold both the volume-down button and the power button at the same time for at least 20 seconds." is useless. I can make sure my device battery has at least 60%. But now the device is almost like a real brick!

I guess this is a hardware problem but I can't send my phone to the Google Repair Center.
I hope some expert can give me some advice to save my phone.I can accept my data erased. Thank you for your help!
